Name: LU 560 - Planning, THE LEROY, 225 West 140th Street, Manhattan (C 170049 PQM)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170049 PQM (L.U. No. 560), for the acquisition of property located at 225 West 140th Street (Block 2026, Lot 15), to facilitate construction of a new seven-story mixed-use building with approximately 20 units of affordable housing in Community District 10, Borough of Manhattan.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 By Council Members Greenfield and Cohen \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 1, 2017 its decision dated February 1, 2017 (the "Decision") on the application submitted pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, for the site acquisition of privately-owned property located at 225 West 140\super th\nosupersub  Street (Block 2026, Lot 15), which in conjunction with the other related action would facilitate construction of a new seven-story mixed-use building with approximately 20 units of affordable housing (the "Site"), (ULURP No. C 170049 PQM), Community District 10, Borough\expndtw-5  of Manhattan\expndtw0  (the "Application");\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\ri138\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application C 170048 HAM (L.U. No. 559), an Urban Development Action Area Project designation and project approval, and disposition of City-owned property;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on February 7, 2017;\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the revised negative declaration issued September 2, 2016 (CEQR No. 16HPD078M) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant effect on the environment as set forth in the Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 170049 PQM, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Adopted.\par
\par

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
